A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think 2 stars was too generous. The more I think about it\, the less stars this piece of excuse of a film deserves. The half star is there for the visual effects. As for a full review\, I'll wait until it comes out on DVD so I can comprehensively deconstruct this mess and show you exactly why it's so terrible.
